report.name: x_ligneppcmActive_orbre

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT A.igne_bip, A.libelle, A.Type, A.DPG, A.CA_Payeur, A.Typologie, NULL AS Chef_de_Projet, NULL AS Metier, NULL AS NomMO, A.projet, A.libprojet, A.applic, A.libappli, NULL AS libdosproj, NULL AS statut, NULL AS date_statut, NULL AS cout12, NULL AS cout, NULL AS stock_immo, A.top_fermeture, A.Client_Payeur, A.Top_tri, A.Paramètre_local, NULL AS CodDossProj, NULL AS PropAA1_Fourn, NULL AS NotAA1, NULL AS ArbAA1, A.PropAA_Fourn, NULL AS ReserveAA, A.NotAA, A.ArbAA, NULL AS PropAA1_Fourn1, NULL AS NotAA11, NULL AS PropAA2_Fourn1, NULL AS NotAA2, NULL AS PropAA1_Client, NULL AS PropAA_Client, NULL AS ConsAvAA1, NULL AS ConsAA1, A.ConsAA, A.ConsMM, NULL AS Consproj, A.ReestAA, NULL AS Projet_special, NULL AS projet_groupe, NULL AS libprojet_groupe, NULL AS applic_groupe, NULL AS libapplic_groupe, NULL AS CodMO_Oper, NULL AS COUTMM, NULL AS DBS, A.client, A.Libelle_DPG, A.Libelle_CSM, A.Application, A.TYPE_DE_PLAN, CASE WHEN (NVL(trim(A.PropAA_Fourn),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(A.NotAA),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(A.ArbAA),'0,00') = '0,00' /*AND NVL(trim(A.PropAA_Client),'0,00') = '0,00'*/ AND NVL(trim(ConsAA),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(ReestAA),'0,00') = '0,00' ) THEN 'OUI' ELSE 'NON' END Valeur0, A.CDS_Fournisseur, A.Sous_type_de_Plan, 'Non trouvee' AS DOMAINE_DRHG, 'Non trouvee' AS ACTIVITe_DRHG, A.Chaine_de_Valeur_H2R, A.Notifie, A.Arbitre, A.Reestime, A.ConsAA as Consomme, A.ConsMM as Mensuel, A.Propose, 'Non trouvee' AS Zone_POS_BSC, 'Non trouvee' AS Quartier_POS_BSC FROM ( SELECT LB.pid igne_bip, LB.pnom libelle, LB.typproj Type, TO_CHAR(LB.codsg) DPG, TO_CHAR(LB.codcamo) CA_Payeur, LB.arctype Typologie, LB.icpi projet, PI.ilibel libprojet, LB.airt applic, AP.alibel libappli, LB.topfer top_fermeture, LB.clicode Client_Payeur, LB.toptri Top_tri, LB.pzone Paramètre_local, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.bpmontme,0),'9999999990D00'),-8,8) PropAA_Fourn, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.bnmont,0),'9999999990D00'), -8,8) NotAA, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.anmont,0),'9999999990D00'), -8,8) ArbAA, substr(to_char(NVL(BUDG.bpmontmo,0),'9999999990D00'),-8,8) PropAA_Client ,-- no need for report lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(CONSO.cusag, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') ConsAA, lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR( ROUND((SAM.consojh_sg +SAM.consojh_ssii ),2) , 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') ConsMM, lpad(ltrim(NVL(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.reestime,0),'9999999999990D00'),-9,9),'0')),9,' ') ReestAA, --new columns --cm.CLISIGLE client, cm.CLILIB client, s.LIBDSG Libelle_DPG , NVL(SUBSTR(s.LIBDSG,1,INSTR(s.LIBDSG||'/','/',1,4)-1),s.LIBDSG) Libelle_CSM, ap.acdareg ||'-' ||APG.alibel Application, CASE WHEN ((l.type_proj = '1') or (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype in ('39','12','B02','B09'))) THEN 'CHANGE' WHEN (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype not in ('39','12','B02','B09')) THEN 'PLAN INTERNE' WHEN l.type_proj = '5' THEN 'STRUCTURE' ELSE 'RUN' END TYPE_DE_PLAN, --NULL AS Valeur0, NVL(SUBSTR(LIBDSG,1,INSTR(LIBDSG||'/','/',1,3)-1),LIBDSG) CDS_Fournisseur, t.LIBARC AS Sous_type_de_Plan, LB.LINEAXISBUSINESS1 Chaine_de_Valeur_H2R, NVL(BUDG.BNMONT,0) Notifie, NVL(BUDG.ANMONT,0) Arbitre, NVL(BUDG.REESTIME,0) Reestime, -- NULL AS Consomme, --NULL AS Mensuel, NVL(BUDG.bpmontme,0) Propose FROM LIGNE_BIP LB, PROJ_INFO PI, APPLICATION AP, APPLICATION APG, BUDGET BUDG, BUDGET BUDG_1, BUDGET BUDG1, BUDGET BUDG2, BUDGET BUDG3, CONSOMME CONSO, CONSOMME CONSO_1, CONSOMME CONSO_2, SYNTHESE_ACTIVITE_MOIS SAM, CLIENT_MO CM, STRUCT_INFO S, datdebex d, type_activite t, lien_types_proj_act l WHERE LB.pid = CONSO.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = SAM.pid (+) AND LB.pid = BUDG.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG3.pid(+) and trim(LB.TYPPROJ) = trim(l.type_proj) AND LB.ARCTYPE = t.arctype AND l.type_act = t.arctype AND t.actif ='O' AND LB.CLICODE =CM.CLICODE AND LB.CODSG = s.CODSG AND LB.airt = AP.airt AND AP.ACDAREG = APG.AIRT AND BUDG.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE AND BUDG_1.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND BUDG1.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+1 AND BUDG2.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+2 AND BUDG3.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+3 AND CONSO.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE AND CONSO_1.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND CONSO_2.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE-2 AND SAM.cdeb(+) = :P_MOISMENS AND LB.icpi = PI.icpi AND LB.airt = AP.airt AND (LB.ADATESTATUT IS NULL OR LB.adatestatut >= d.datdebex) and LB.codcamo <> '77777' &P_HAB &P_WHERE ORDER BY LB.ADATESTATUT ) A union all SELECT A.igne_bip, A.libelle, A.Type, A.DPG, A.CA_Payeur, A.Typologie, NULL AS Chef_de_Projet, NULL AS Metier, NULL AS NomMO, A.projet, A.libprojet, A.applic, A.libappli, NULL AS libdosproj, NULL AS statut, NULL AS date_statut, NULL AS cout12, NULL AS cout, NULL AS stock_immo, A.top_fermeture, A.Client_Payeur, A.Top_tri, A.Paramètre_local, NULL AS CodDossProj, NULL AS PropAA1_Fourn, NULL AS NotAA1, NULL AS ArbAA1, A.PropAA_Fourn, NULL AS ReserveAA, A.NotAA, A.ArbAA, NULL AS PropAA1_Fourn1, NULL AS NotAA11, NULL AS PropAA2_Fourn1, NULL AS NotAA2, NULL AS PropAA1_Client, NULL AS PropAA_Client, NULL AS ConsAvAA1, NULL AS ConsAA1, A.ConsAA, A.ConsMM, NULL AS Consproj, A.ReestAA, NULL AS Projet_special, NULL AS projet_groupe, NULL AS libprojet_groupe, NULL AS applic_groupe, NULL AS libapplic_groupe, NULL AS CodMO_Oper, NULL AS COUTMM, NULL AS DBS, A.client, A.Libelle_DPG, A.Libelle_CSM, A.Application, A.TYPE_DE_PLAN, CASE WHEN (NVL(trim(A.PropAA_Fourn),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(A.NotAA),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(A.ArbAA),'0,00') = '0,00' /*AND NVL(trim(A.PropAA_Client),'0,00') = '0,00'*/ AND NVL(trim(ConsAA),'0,00') = '0,00' AND NVL(trim(ReestAA),'0,00') = '0,00' ) THEN 'OUI' ELSE 'NON' END Valeur0, A.CDS_Fournisseur, A.Sous_type_de_Plan, 'Non trouvee' AS DOMAINE_DRHG, 'Non trouvee' AS ACTIVITe_DRHG, A.Chaine_de_Valeur_H2R, A.Notifie, A.Arbitre, A.Reestime, to_char((nvl(a.cusag,0) * (nvl(a.tauxrep,100)/100))) as Consomme, to_char((nvl(ROUND((a.consojh_sg+a.consojh_ssii ),2),0) * (nvl(a.tauxrep,100)/100))) as Mensuel, A.Propose, 'Non trouvee' AS Zone_POS_BSC, 'Non trouvee' AS Quartier_POS_BSC FROM ( SELECT LB.pid igne_bip, LB.pnom libelle, LB.typproj Type, TO_CHAR(LB.codsg) DPG, --TO_CHAR(LB.codcamo) CA_Payeur, TO_CHAR(rl.codcamo) CA_Payeur, LB.arctype Typologie, LB.icpi projet, PI.ilibel libprojet, LB.airt applic, AP.alibel libappli, LB.topfer top_fermeture, --LB.clicode Client_Payeur, rl.clicode Client_Payeur, LB.toptri Top_tri, LB.pzone Paramètre_local, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.bpmontme,0),'9999999990D00'),-8,8) PropAA_Fourn, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.bnmont,0),'9999999990D00'), -8,8) NotAA, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.anmont,0),'9999999990D00'), -8,8) ArbAA, substr(to_char(NVL(BUDG.bpmontmo,0),'9999999990D00'),-8,8) PropAA_Client ,-- no need for report lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR(nvl(CONSO.cusag,0) , 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') ConsAA, lpad(NVL(TO_CHAR( nvl(ROUND((SAM.consojh_sg+SAM.consojh_ssii ),2),0) , 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),8,' ') ConsMM, lpad(ltrim(NVL(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(NVL(BUDG.reestime,0),'9999999999990D00'),-9,9),'0')),9,' ') ReestAA, --new columns --cm.CLISIGLE client, --CM1.CLISIGLE client, cm1.CLILIB client, s.LIBDSG Libelle_DPG , NVL(SUBSTR(s.LIBDSG,1,INSTR(s.LIBDSG||'/','/',1,4)-1),s.LIBDSG) Libelle_CSM, ap.acdareg ||'-' ||APG.alibel Application, CASE WHEN ((l.type_proj = '1') or (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype in ('39','12','B02','B09'))) THEN 'CHANGE' WHEN (l.type_proj = '2' and t.arctype not in ('39','12','B02','B09')) THEN 'PLAN INTERNE' WHEN l.type_proj = '5' THEN 'STRUCTURE' ELSE 'RUN' END TYPE_DE_PLAN, --NULL AS Valeur0, NVL(SUBSTR(LIBDSG,1,INSTR(LIBDSG||'/','/',1,3)-1),s.LIBDSG) CDS_Fournisseur, t.LIBARC AS Sous_type_de_Plan, LB.LINEAXISBUSINESS1 Chaine_de_Valeur_H2R, (NVL(BUDG.BNMONT,0) * (nvl(rl.tauxrep,100)/100)) Notifie, (NVL(BUDG.ANMONT,0) * (nvl(rl.tauxrep,100)/100)) Arbitre, (NVL(BUDG.REESTIME,0) * (nvl(rl.tauxrep,100)/100)) Reestime, -- NULL AS Consomme, --NULL AS Mensuel, (NVL(BUDG.bpmontme,0) * (nvl(rl.tauxrep,100)/100)) Propose, rl.tauxrep, SAM.consojh_sg, SAM.consojh_ssii, CONSO.cusag FROM LIGNE_BIP LB, PROJ_INFO PI, APPLICATION AP, APPLICATION APG, BUDGET BUDG, BUDGET BUDG_1, BUDGET BUDG1, BUDGET BUDG2, BUDGET BUDG3, CONSOMME CONSO, CONSOMME CONSO_1, CONSOMME CONSO_2, SYNTHESE_ACTIVITE_MOIS SAM, CLIENT_MO CM, STRUCT_INFO S, datdebex d, type_activite t, lien_types_proj_act l, REPARTITION_LIGNE RL , CENTRE_ACTIVITE CA, CLIENT_MO CM1 WHERE LB.pid = CONSO.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = CONSO_2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = SAM.pid (+) AND LB.pid = BUDG.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG_1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG1.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG2.pid(+) AND LB.pid = BUDG3.pid(+) and trim(LB.TYPPROJ) = trim(l.type_proj) AND LB.ARCTYPE = t.arctype AND l.type_act = t.arctype AND t.actif ='O' AND LB.CLICODE =CM.CLICODE AND LB.CODSG = s.CODSG AND LB.airt = AP.airt AND AP.ACDAREG = APG.AIRT AND BUDG.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE AND BUDG_1.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND BUDG1.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+1 AND BUDG2.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+2 AND BUDG3.ANNEE(+) = :P_ANNEE+3 AND CONSO.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE AND CONSO_1.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE-1 AND CONSO_2.ANNEE (+) = :P_ANNEE-2 AND SAM.cdeb(+) = :P_MOISMENS AND LB.icpi = PI.icpi AND LB.airt = AP.airt AND (LB.ADATESTATUT IS NULL OR LB.adatestatut >= d.datdebex) and LB.codcamo = '77777' and LB.pid = rl.pid AND rl.codcamo = ca.codcamo AND rl.clicode = CM1.clicode (+) and RL.DATFIN is null --AND rl.datdeb = -- (SELECT MAX(datdeb) -- FROM repartition_ligne -- WHERE PID = rl.PID -- AND CODCAMO = rl.CODCAMO -- ) &P_HAB &P_WHERE ORDER BY LB.ADATESTATUT ) A;

function.name: afterpform
p_perimovalidtrigger
